auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.registerCreatorDescription: Create your own idea ranking and connect with your audience
auth.registerAudienceDescription: Vote for your favorite creator's ideas and help them decide what to create next
auth.creatorRoleDescription: Share ideas and get feedback from your audience
auth.audienceRoleDescription: Vote for your favorite creator's ideas

common.alreadyVotedDesc: You have already voted for this idea
common.yourOpinionMatters: Your opinion matters to this creator

creator.voteSuccessDesc: Your vote has been registered successfully
creator.voteErrorDesc: Could not register your vote. Please try again.
creator.defaultProfileDescription: QA Engineer and content creator focused on software testing, automation, and quality control best practices.

suggestIdea.beFirstToSuggest: Be the first to suggest a content idea
suggestIdea.title: Suggest an Idea
suggestIdea.description: What would you like the creator to publish next?
suggestIdea.loginRequiredDesc: You need an account to suggest ideas to this creator.
suggestIdea.thankYouDesc: Your idea has been sent to the creator for approval.
suggestIdea.errorDesc: An error occurred while sending your suggestion
suggestIdea.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 3 characters
suggestIdea.titleMaxLength: Title must be 100 characters or less
suggestIdea.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
suggestIdea.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be 500 characters or less
suggestIdea.achievementText: Your idea has been sent to @{{username}}!
suggestIdea.ideaSentDesc: The creator will review it soon. Thank you for your contribution!

ideas.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this idea? This action cannot be undone and all votes will be lost.
ideas.createFirstIdea: Create your first idea to get started

dashboard.voteDescription: Vote for your favorite ideas or submit your own
dashboard.shareProfileDesc: This link directs your followers to the public version of your profile, where they can view and vote for your content ideas.
dashboard.publicProfileVisibility: This page is visible to anyone with the link, even if they don't have an account on the platform.
dashboard.visitorVoting: Visitors can view your ideas and vote for them, helping you determine what content to create first.
dashboard.shareTip1: Share your link on social media to get more votes
dashboard.shareTip2: Include the link in your video or post descriptions
dashboard.shareTip3: Encourage your audience to vote to influence your next content

ideaForm.addDescription: Share your idea with the community. Be clear and concise to get more votes!

publicLeaderboard.title: Public Leaderboard
publicLeaderboard.description: Vote for the best ideas from the community
publicLeaderboard.noIdeasDescription: Be the first to suggest an idea!

subscription.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of your platform
subscription.freeTrialDescription: Experience all premium features without commitment
subscription.trialActivatedDesc: You have 14 days to try all premium features.
subscription.subscriptionCancelledDesc: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period.
subscription.createSessionError: Could not create payment session. Please try again.
subscription.startTrialError: Could not activate trial. Please try again.
subscription.cancelError: Could not cancel subscription. Please try again.

paymentSuccess.title: Payment Successful!
paymentSuccess.subtitle: You are now Premium!
paymentSuccess.description: Your subscription has been activated successfully. You can now enjoy all premium features.
paymentSuccess.confirmationEmail: You will receive a confirmation email with your subscription details.

paymentCancelled.title: Payment Cancelled
paymentCancelled.subtitle: Don't worry
paymentCancelled.description: The payment process was cancelled. Your account remains unchanged and you can try again when you're ready.
paymentCancelled.needHelpDesc: If you have any questions about our plans or need assistance, don't hesitate to contact us.
paymentCancelled.tryAgainLater: You can always change your mind and subscribe later.
